quizzes.title: Potions O.W.L.
quizzes.description: A comprehensive exam on the art and science of potion-making. Do you have what it takes?

quizzes.title: Charms O.W.L.
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of spell-casting, incantations, and the subtle art of charm-work.

quizzes.title: Transfiguration O.W.L.
quizzes.description: From switching spells to human transfiguration, this exam covers the most scientific of magical disciplines.

quizzes.title: Defence Against the Dark Arts O.W.L.
quizzes.description: Confront Boggarts, duel with dark creatures, and prove your ability to defend yourself and others.

quizzes.title: History of Magic O.W.L.
quizzes.description: Do you know your Goblin Rebellions from your Werewolf Codes of Conduct? An exam for the historically inclined.

quizzes.title: Herbology O.W.L.
quizzes.description: Identify dangerous and magical flora, from the Venomous Tentacula to the Screaming Mandrake.

quizzes.title: Astronomy O.W.L.
quizzes.description: Map the stars, identify constellations, and understand the movements of celestial bodies from the highest tower.

quizzes.title: The Sorting Hat
quizzes.description: This is not an exam, but a journey of self-discovery. Let the Sorting Hat reveal your true Hogwarts House.

quizzes.title: Jedi Trials
quizzes.description: Is the Force strong with you? Test your knowledge of the Jedi Code, lightsaber forms, and the ways of the Force.
